scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.build: concurrently "cd server && npm run build" "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.render-build: npm install && npm run build && mkdir -p server/dist/client && cp -R client/dist/* server/dist/client/
